pr_title: mgmt update for test vm sizes

timeline.message: mgmt update for test vm sizes

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to put this to a static method in shared class in test? So it could be easier to modify if needed.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText:
I was planning to do that like your suggestion mentioned. The potential change is to set static value inside ResourceManagerTestBase and Utils(for sample).
For next live run, some tests might fail with clear error message when the current size does not meet disks/nic configurations. The potential change is to use a larger size. This part has been completed in track 1.
Based on above, we need to prepare 2-3 static values for vm sizes both test base and sample utils. We could add that after live tests pass.
replies.author: xseeseesee
